text.div:
US Laboratory Observation Specimen Rejection Codes

This value set defines the set of code for identifying the reason why the specimen condition prevented the test form being completed.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/v2/0490

name: US Laboratory Observation Specimen Rejection Codes
publisher: HL7 International - Orders and Observations WG
description: This value set defines the set of code for identifying the reason why the specimen condition prevented the test form being completed.
